api

Class DocExtractInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.DocExtractInfo

  • @RestController
 @EnableAutoConfiguration(exclude=org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.gson.GsonAutoConfiguration.class)
 @SpringBootApplication
public class DocExtractInfo
extends Object
    This class exposes the information extraction REST APIs through the Swagger interface.
    Author:
    Debasis Ganguly

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocExtractInfo()
      This constructor function creates a new 'InformationExtractor' object with the default 'init.properties' file residing on the root of the maven project.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocExtractInfo

        public DocExtractInfo()
        This constructor function creates a new 'InformationExtractor' object with the default 'init.properties' file residing on the root of the maven project. It also initialises the list of attributes that are to be extracted through the REST APIs. This function also trains a naive Bayes classifier model on the training set of annotations. Since this is a one-time activity, it does not affect the runtime of the APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • extractMinAge

        @RequestMapping(value="/extract/minage",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
protected IUnitPOJO extractMinAge(@RequestParam(value="ntoppassages",required=false,defaultValue="3")
                                                                                                                                                        Integer numTopPassagesToRetrieve,
                                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="wsizes",required=false,defaultValue="10,20")
                                                                                                                                                        String wsizes,
                                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                        org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile doc)
                                                                                                                                                 throws Exception
        This function extracts the minimum age value from a given document after constructing an in-memory passage index by slicing the content of the document object into passages (either sentences or windows).
        Parameters:
        numTopPassagesToRetrieve - Number of top-ranked passages to use for answer extraction.
        wsizes - number of words to define a window; supports specifying comma-separated values for multiple window sizes, e.g. '10,20'
        doc - a 'MultipartFile' document object through the REST API flow.
        Returns:
        An IUnitPOJO object that encodes in JSON the values extracted from the given pdf file.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractBCT

        @RequestMapping(value="/extract/bct",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
protected IUnitPOJO extractBCT(@RequestParam(value="code",required=true,defaultValue="1.1")
                                                                                                                                                  String code,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="ntoppassages",required=false,defaultValue="3")
                                                                                                                                                  Integer numTopPassagesToRetrieve,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="wsizes",required=false,defaultValue="10,20")
                                                                                                                                                  String wsizes,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="threshold",required=false,defaultValue="0.2")
                                                                                                                                                  Float threshold,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile doc)
                                                                                                                                           throws Exception
        This function extracts a specified BCT (identified by a given code) from a PDF document. The algorithm used to extract the BCT is unsupervised. Every BCT is associated with a pre-configured query which is used to retrieve a list of ranked passages. The threshold is then applied to output a binary decision about the presence/absence of the BCT.
        Parameters:
        code - Identifies a particular BCT with a unique code
        numTopPassagesToRetrieve - The number of top-ranked passages to use for extracting the BCT.
        wsizes - Comma separated list of values that can be used as window sizes
        threshold - The similarity value above which the decision is a '1' (presence of the given BCT).
        doc - a 'MultipartFile' document object through the REST API flow.
        Returns:
        An IUnitPOJO object that encodes in JSON the values extracted from the given pdf file.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractSupervisedBCT

        @RequestMapping(value="/extract/bct/supervised",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
protected IUnitPOJO extractSupervisedBCT(@RequestParam(value="code",required=true,defaultValue="1.1")
                                                                                                                                                                       String code,
                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="ntoppassages",required=false,defaultValue="3")
                                                                                                                                                                       Integer numTopPassagesToRetrieve,
                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="wsizes",required=false,defaultValue="10,20")
                                                                                                                                                                       String wsizes,
                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="threshold",required=false,defaultValue="0.2")
                                                                                                                                                                       Float threshold,
                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="textclassifier",required=false,defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                                       Boolean applyNB,
                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile doc)
                                                                                                                                                                throws Exception
        This function extracts a specified BCT (identified by a given code) from a PDF document. The algorithm used to extract the BCT is supervised. Instead of using a pre-configured query to extract a BCT, the system learns the queries from a set of annotated examples of BCTs. Similar to the unsupervised approach, the threshold is then applied to output a binary decision about the presence/absence of the BCT.
        Parameters:
        code - Identifies a particular BCT with a unique code
        numTopPassagesToRetrieve - The number of top-ranked passages to use for extracting the BCT.
        wsizes - Comma separated list of values that can be used as window sizes
        threshold - The similarity value above which the decision is a '1' (presence of the given BCT).
        applyNB - A Boolean parameter indicating whether to apply a one-class only classification or a binary classifier (Naive Bayes) that's trained on pseudo-negative annotations. A pseudo-negative annotation is a passage (which is itself not annotated) but is top-k similar to the query learned from the annotations.
        doc - a 'MultipartFile' document object through the REST API flow.
        Returns:
        An IUnitPOJO object that encodes in JSON the values extracted from the given pdf file.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractAllSupervisedBCT

        @RequestMapping(value="/extract/allbcts/supervised",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
protected IUnitPOJOs extractAllSupervisedBCT(@RequestParam(value="ntoppassages",required=false,defaultValue="3")
                                                                                                                                                                               Integer numTopPassagesToRetrieve,
                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="wsizes",required=false,defaultValue="10,20")
                                                                                                                                                                               String wsizes,
                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="threshold",required=false,defaultValue="0.2")
                                                                                                                                                                               Float threshold,
                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="textclassifier",required=false,defaultValue="true")
                                                                                                                                                                               Boolean applyNB,
                                                                                                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                                               org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile doc)
                                                                                                                                                                        throws Exception
        This function extracts all BCTs (as per the BCI ontology) from a PDF document. The algorithm used to extract the BCTs is supervised. Instead of using a pre-configured query to extract a BCT, the system learns the queries from a set of annotated examples of BCTs. Similar to the unsupervised approach, the threshold is then applied to output a binary decision about the presence/absence of the BCT.
        Parameters:
        numTopPassagesToRetrieve - The number of top-ranked passages to use for extracting the BCT.
        wsizes - Comma separated list of values that can be used as window sizes
        threshold - The similarity value above which the decision is a '1' (presence of the given BCT).
        doc - a 'MultipartFile' document object through the REST API flow.
        Returns:
        An IUnitPOJO object that encodes in JSON the values extracted from the given pdf file.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractAllBCTs

        @RequestMapping(value="/extract/allbcts",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
protected IUnitPOJOs extractAllBCTs(@RequestParam(value="ntoppassages",required=false,defaultValue="3")
                                                                                                                                                           Integer numTopPassagesToRetrieve,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="wsizes",required=false,defaultValue="10,20")
                                                                                                                                                           String wsizes,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="threshold",required=false,defaultValue="0.2")
                                                                                                                                                           Float threshold,
                                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                           org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile doc)
                                                                                                                                                    throws Exception
        This function extracts all BCTs (as per the HBCP ontology) from a PDF document. The algorithm used to extract the BCT is unsupervised, i.e. the system uses a pre-configured query to extract each BCT. A threshold corresponding to each BCT is then applied to output a binary decision about the presence/absence of that BCT.
        Parameters:
        numTopPassagesToRetrieve - The number of top-ranked passages to
        wsizes - Comma separated list of values that can be used as window sizes
        threshold - The similarity value above which the decision is a '1' (presence of the given BCT).
        doc - a 'MultipartFile' document object through the REST API flow.
        Returns:
        An IUnitPOJO object that encodes in JSON the values extracted from the given pdf file.
        Throws:
        Exception
